title: Gun-dou Musashi (Gun Samurai)
synopsis: The adventures of a whiny teenage Miyamoto Musashi, his electro-sword and demon-sealing revolvers, and his quest to win the love of the beautiful Kaguyahime.
voices: ['Namikawa, Daisuke', 'Tanaka, Soichiro', 'Yanagisawa, Mayumi', 'Nakamura, Chie', 'Hirota, Kousei', 'Kobayashi, Yuu']
staff: [['Kinoshita, Yuuki', ['Director']], ['Takakuwa, Hajime', ['Sound Director']], ['Kimeru', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Monkey Punch', ['Original Creator']]]
